0.1.name: wordpress/google-plus-page-shortcode
0.1.description:
Add a Google+ Page button easily with this plugin. The shortcode is [googlepage]

Usage: * Smallest icon: [googlepage page=YOUR_PAGE_ID] * Medium icon: [googlepage size=32 page=YOUR_PAGE_ID] * Biggest icon: [googlepage size=64 page=YOUR_PAGE_ID]

In page=x where x is your Google+ Page number.
